full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and driven fresher with a passion for software development, Showing strong problem-solving skills Proficient in technologies such as java, python and Tools like power Automate. projects.name: Heart Disease Classification
projects.description: Developed a heart disease classification model using Python, aimed at accurately identifying individuals with heart disease by analyzing various health metrics. Emphasized high recall for the positive class to ensure comprehensive identification of potential Patients. Implemented and tuned models like Logistic Regression, KNN SVM, Decision Tree, Random Forest. Evaluated model performance using Precision, recall, and F1-score

projects.name: ID Card Generator
projects.description: Designed an implemented ID card generator using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, aimed at seamlessly upgrading user data and dynamically generating personalized ID cards.

projects.name: Marks Management System
projects.description: Developed desktop based Tkinter GUI application to manage students marks which are stored in excel sheets. Features such as sending students marks to parents, respective subject faculty using smtp library in python.

projects.name: Restaurant Website
